intro: In the peaceful village of Acornville, an ancient legend tells of a treasure hidden by the town's first explorer, a secret that has intrigued generations.
description:
In this exciting and fun Visual Novel, a mysterious map appears during a stormy night in the village of some adorable little hamsters.

Lía, Tico, Roco and Pita decide to embark on an exciting adventure.

As they travel through unknown landscapes and face unexpected challenges, the young hamsters discover that each step of their journey holds lessons that will change the way they see the world and themselves.
